entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpoxsv6gs4/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0054.7490] The definition linkbase in the extension taxonomy defines the axis Statement Geographical Axis as an axis of the table Schedule Of Defined Benefit Plans Disclosures [Table]. This axis cannot be used on this table as this axis is expressly prohibited from being used on this table by the 2017 FASB taxonomy and retirement benefits implementation guide. Consider using the axis Retirement Plan Sponsor Location [Axis] instead.
Rule Element Id:7490 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
